entries: You are a digger from the Hookclaw kobold tribe, born beneath the streets of Absalom, with muscles and mind hardened by years spent tunneling through rock and earth and a confidence built upon your pride in your draconic heritage.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Crafting} skill, the {@skill Lore||Mining Lore} skill, and the Engineering Lore skill. You gain the {@feat Improvise Tool|APG} skill feat.
